rules.natural: If the material was discovered to yield the drug, then the drug is safe.
Provided that the material was analyzed, then if the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.
Whenever the drug is toxic, it follows that the drug is safe.
In the event that the drug has side effects, the drug is safe.
The drug was discontinued, or the drug is toxic, or the drug has side effects.
If the drug was patented, then the drug was marketed.
Either the drug was patented or the drug was licensed.
Whenever the drug was licensed, it is not the case that the drug was rejected.
If the drug was marketed, then the drug was not rejected.
The sourcing is controversial, or if the sourcing is sustainable, then the drug is effective.
Provided that a clinical trial was conducted for the drug, the results were published.
If the drug was withdrawn, then it is not the case that the drug was recalled.
The drug was monitored, or if it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, then the drug was withdrawn.
If the material was synthesized into the drug, then provided that the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was tested on an animal.
Either the material was synthesized into the drug or the material was extracted to produce the drug.
Whenever the material was extracted to produce the drug, then if the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was tested on an animal.
If the drug is effective, then in the event that the drug is not safe, the drug was approved.
Provided that the material was sourced from a natural place, the sourcing is sustainable.
In the event that the material was purified, then if the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.
Either the material was purified or the material was processed.
If the material was processed, then the material was analyzed.
Provided that it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, the drug was recalled.
If it is not the case that the approval was expedited or if the drug is not safe then the drug was approved, then a clinical trial was conducted for the drug.
Provided that the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was rejected.
In the event that the drug is not safe, it is not the case that the drug was approved.

(A1 → G).natural: If the material was discovered to yield the drug, then the drug is safe.

(A10 → (A7 → A6)).natural: Provided that the material was analyzed, then if the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.

(A11 → G).natural: Whenever the drug is toxic, it follows that the drug is safe.

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either the drug is toxic or the drug has side effects.

(A12 → G).natural: In the event that the drug has side effects, the drug is safe.

(A13 ∨ (A11 ∨ A12)).natural: The drug was discontinued, or the drug is toxic, or the drug has side effects.

(A15 → A17).natural: If the drug was patented, then the drug was marketed.

(A15 → ¬A14).natural: Provided that the drug was patented, it is not the case that the drug was rejected.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: Either the drug was patented or the drug was licensed.

(A16 → ¬A14).natural: Whenever the drug was licensed, it is not the case that the drug was rejected.

(A17 → ¬A14).natural: If the drug was marketed, then the drug was not rejected.

(A18 → A6).natural: In the event that the sourcing is sustainable, the drug is effective.

(A19 ∨ (A18 → A6)).natural: The sourcing is controversial, or if the sourcing is sustainable, then the drug is effective.

(A20 ∨ (¬G → A5)).natural: Either the approval was expedited, or if the drug is not safe, then the drug was approved.

(A21 → A22).natural: Provided that a clinical trial was conducted for the drug, the results were published.

(A24 → ¬A23).natural: If the drug was withdrawn, then it is not the case that the drug was recalled.

(A25 ∨ (¬(A11 ∨ A12) → A24)).natural: The drug was monitored, or if it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, then the drug was withdrawn.

(A3 → (¬A1 → A2)).natural: If the material was synthesized into the drug, then provided that the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was tested on an animal.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Either the material was synthesized into the drug or the material was extracted to produce the drug.

(A4 → (¬A1 → A2)).natural: Whenever the material was extracted to produce the drug, then if the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was tested on an animal.

(A6 → (¬G → A5)).natural: If the drug is effective, then in the event that the drug is not safe, the drug was approved.

(A7 → A18).natural: Provided that the material was sourced from a natural place, the sourcing is sustainable.

(A7 → A6).natural: If the material was sourced from a natural place, then the drug is effective.

(A8 → (A7 → A6)).natural: In the event that the material was purified, then if the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the material was purified or the material was processed.

(A9 → (A7 → A6)).natural: Whenever the material was processed, then provided that the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.

(A9 → A10).natural: If the material was processed, then the material was analyzed.

(¬(A11 ∨ A12) → A23).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, the drug was recalled.

(¬(A11 ∨ A12) → A24).natural: If it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, then the drug was withdrawn.

(¬(A11 ∨ A12) → ¬A23).natural: In the event that it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, it is not the case that the drug was recalled.

(¬(A20 ∨ (¬G → A5)) → A21).natural: If it is not the case that the approval was expedited or if the drug is not safe then the drug was approved, then a clinical trial was conducted for the drug.

(¬A1 → A14).natural: Provided that the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was rejected.

(¬A1 → A2).natural: If the material was not discovered to yield the drug, then the drug was tested on an animal.

(¬G → A5).natural: Whenever the drug is not safe, the drug was approved.

(¬G → ¬A5).natural: In the event that the drug is not safe, it is not the case that the drug was approved.
